entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few showers. High 20.
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with a few showers beginning in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. High 20. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Showers beginning before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
